markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Second Wind](/Feats.aspx?ID=138) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 89 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath. You can Rage without waiting for 1 minute after the previous Rage (or 1 round, with quick rage), but when you end this second Rage, you’re fatigued until you rest for 10 minutes.
name: Second Wind
